import React, {useContext} from 'react'; //Component import ProductCarousel from './ProductCarousel'; import { CHANGE_PRODUCT } from '../../../Redux/Action/actionType'; import { contextApi } from '../../../Redux/Reducer'; function Recommend() { const { productDispatch }= useContext(contextApi); return (
